ygData.subject: Reduced Taunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Had one of those weird AE Taunt things last night.  Anyone else getting these since the Reduced Bard Hate patch? Ran out of lavastorm with 50 health.  Couldn t
ygData.messageBody:
Had one of those weird AE Taunt things last night. Anyone else getting these
since the Reduced Bard Hate patch?

Ran out of lavastorm with 50 health. Couldn't even see a pixel on my health
bar. Entered Nek and fired up the Hymn.

Two players are killing a DE guard 30 feet from me, on the path. Guard spins
around, runs down the path, across the zone entrance alcove,
and cuts my head off.

I'm not grouped. I'm not anywhere near the guard. I've been in the zone
exactly 15 seconds, and I manage to taunt a half dead guard away
from the 2 guys who are killing it.

Suck. If this is reduced, maybe I should be grateful for the 15 seconds I had
before I was killed.

Golias the Dead
